name: Pully!
description:
Pully!

is an android game where you pull rows of blocks to combine 3 or more of the same color blocks to score points.

This game currently has 3 different game modes:

Time attack

In this game mode you try to score as many points as you can in 90 seconds.

Clear the field

In this game mode you try to clear the field from of all blocks, you have no time limit to do this.

Endless

This game mode is similar to Time attack mode, only there is no time limit. you play this till you get bored.

You can download this game for free on the android play store!
